entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Cartwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:52 PM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cartwright Airport 6:28 PM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -0.7°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -0.8°C
Wind: NE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of freezing rain mixed with freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or freezing drizzle changing to periods of drizzle or freezing drizzle after midnight. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow or freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle changing to snow in the evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023
